alert.note: Alert for Northern Erie; Southern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 3:42PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Erie County through 445 PM EDT... At 341 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Albion, or 14 miles east of Conneaut, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. Heavy rainfall will also accompany all thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Erie, Girard, Waterford, Albion, Northwest Harborcreek, Harborcreek, Lawrence Park, Wesleyville, Lake City, Cranesville, Platea, McKean, Northwest Harborcr and Avonia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Very heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
